name: incompleteness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact or state of not having some parts, or of not being finished: They said nothing about the incompleteness of the information. He realised her value, his own incompleteness without her. See
incomplete
More examplesFewer examplesAnother problem is the apparent incompleteness of the map.The living room was L-shaped, signifying a sense of incompleteness.An air of incompleteness permeates even finished projects.
